activities: Netpop Research provides primary market research services. Data collected is general demographic information and opinions about products and services offered by the sponsor of the survey.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer lists provided by clients and data entered by respondents to surveys
recoursemech: Netpop Research, LLC uses the Better Business Bureau EU Safe Harbor Program for dispute resolution.
